Posts.Content: This is part of a message my friend e-mailed me. She is finishing a year of being on herceptin. As you can see she has been feeling nerve pain for a while. She has had all kinds of tests done. Has anyone had trouble like that, and any suggestions I can give to her?  "I am experiencing continuing pain all over my body and we don't know why (it should be improving, not getting worse).  I still have the pain from neuropathy, but that doesn't explain the pain I feel in my back, hips, knees, etc. (it is joint pain, muscle pain and tissue pain all combined)" Thanks,  Mike
Posts.Title: my friend has pain all over after treatment. Any Ideas?

Posts.Content: I will ask her. What did you do for the pain. did it just go away?
Posts.Title: my friend has pain all over after treatment. Any Ideas?
